Author: SalvatoreDevelopment
Name: AetherFM
Description:
In-game radio streaming for Final Fantasy XIV. Enter a stream URL and listen to your favorite radio! Features external plugin integration for Umbra widgets and other plugins via reflection.

Note: AetherFM is only supported on Windows. Due to its reliance on the NAudio library, audio playback is not available on Linux or non-Windows versions of Dalamud.
Changelog: v1.3.0: Update to API 14 (Patch 7.4), Performance overhaul (Caching/Limit), Country filters fixed.
